a.title: quickLink
a.p: Learn more about what makes SBCSC the best public school choice in the area for your student.

a.title: quickLink
a.p: Wanting to attend a South Bend School? Learn more about our curriculum, enrollment, school boundaries and facilities.

a.title: quickLink
a.p: Interested in athletics or fine arts? SBCSC provides countless opportunities for our student athletes and for our students with a passion for the arts.

p.a: Join #TeamSouthBend! We are a highly professional staff with a passion for educating the youth entrusted to us. Learn more about our employment opportunities and benefits and compensation

a.title: Bulk meals provided four days per week with additional meals for the weekend

div.div: Bulk meals provided four days per week with additional meals for the weekend

South Bend Community School Corporation and our partners provide bulk grab-and-go meals from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. Monday through Thursday with additional meals for the weekend. Kennedy Academy distributes meals 2 p.m. - 4 p.m. only.

div.span: Read More About Bulk meals provided four days per week with additional meals for the weekend

a.title: Referendum Informational Forum to be held April 16 via Facebook Live

img.alt: Referendum Informational Forum to be held April 16 via Facebook Live

div.div: Referendum Informational Forum to be held April 16 via Facebook Live
Superintendent Dr. C. Todd Cummings will answer your questions about the referendum on a Facebook live event at 5 p.m. on Thursday, April 16.

div.span: Read More About Referendum Informational Forum to be held April 16 via Facebook Live

a.title: South Bend Education Foundation program to help high school students

img.alt: South Bend Education Foundation program to help high school students

div.div: South Bend Education Foundation program to help high school students
The South Bend Education Foundation is raising funds to help high school student workers who are dealing with financial difficulties due to reduced hours and layoffs in recent weeks.
